TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UrlPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UrlPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義控制項用來識別包含 URL 值之字串屬性 (Property) 的屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Defines the attribute that controls use to identify string properties containing URL values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用於表示 URL 的控制項屬性的屬性。The attribute is an attribute applied to a control property that represents a URL. 除了標記以表示 URL 的字串屬性屬性定義識別可用來對屬性篩選的特定檔案類型的屬性。In addition to marking a string property as representing a URL, the attribute defines the property that identifies specific file types that can be used to filter against the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作 URL 特定屬性的類別。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此程式碼範例中，屬性套用至`TargetUrl`屬性`CustomHyperLinkControl`類別。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 屬性會設定 ASP.NET 檔案的特定檔案篩選器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別預設的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設執行個體類別會使用初始化屬性設定為值"*。\*"。A default instance of the class is initialized with the property set to the value "*.\*". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作 URL 特定屬性的類別。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此程式碼範例中，預設值屬性套用至`TargetUrl`屬性`CustomHyperLinkControl`類別。In this code example, a default attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 此屬性會指出支援的所有 URL 類型，並指定預設檔案篩選器設定為"*。\*".The attribute indicates support for all URL types and specifies a default file filter set to "*.\*". [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filter) cil managed

param.name: filter
param.span: 與 URL 特定屬性關聯的檔案篩選條件。

span.span: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並將 屬性設定為指定字串。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體使用這個建構函式建立的類別會使用初始化屬性設定為`filter`。An instance of a class created with this constructor is initialized with the property set to `filter`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作 URL 特定屬性的類別。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此程式碼範例中，屬性套用至`TargetUrl`屬性`CustomHyperLinkControl`類別。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 屬性會設定 ASP.NET 檔案的特定檔案篩選器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Filter As String
public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與 URL 特定屬性關聯的檔案篩選條件。

span.span: Gets a file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

value.span: 與 URL 特定屬性關聯的檔案篩選條件。

span.span: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具提供的檔案為基礎的選取器中的篩選條件屬性。A designer provides a filter in file selectors based on the attribute. 根據預設，它會初始化為"*。\*"，指定所有檔案與檔案副檔名。By default, it is initialized to "*.\*", which specifies all files with a file extension. 您可以設定篩選器更特定的檔案類型。例如，篩選器"\*.aspx 」 表示只有 ASP.NET 檔案都由 URL 特定屬性。You can set the filter for more specific file types; for example, the filter "\*.aspx" indicates that only ASP.NET files are represented by the URL-specific property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this instance.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。
